text: Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ia mɨgei, ia pamten uan ikɨrɨmɨrim gɨnɨghnɨghɨva, kamaghɨn azangan markɨ, e dagher manatamra damam, o e dɨpar manatamra damam? Egh ia pamten uan inivafɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh mɨkɨman markɨ, e inir manatam uan mɨkarziba avam? Gumazimɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim ti daghebagh afira, ezɨ gumazimɨn mɨkarzim ti inibagh afira.
